page.title: 12CHURCHES AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: IN BYFIELD THERE IS A CHURCH CALLED THE HOLY CROSS,WHICH IS A CHURCH OF ENGLAND.THERE IS ALSO A METHODIST CHAPEL.THE HOLY CROSS CHURCH IS LIKED THE MOST.MOST PEOPLE THAT GO TO THE CHURCH HELP OUT EITHER BY RAISING MONEY,SEVING OR BY PUTTING FRESH FLOWERS IN THE CHURCH.ALTHOUGH THE HOLY CROSS IS FAVOURED,MOST PEOPLE SAY IT DOE NOT PLAY AN IMPORTANT PART IN THEIR LIFE AS THEY CHOOSE NOT TO USE IT ALL THE TIME.ST.JOHN'S BAPTIST CHURCH IS AN ANGLICAN CHURCH AND SERVES UPPER AND LOWER BODDINGTON,THE RECTOR LIVING IN BYFIELD.THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF COMMUNICANTS IS 20.UPPER BODDINGTON METHODIST CHURCH IS IN THE BANBURY CIRCUIT.BYFIELD CHURCH WAS MADE IN THE 13TH.CENTURY,AND BODDINGTON CHURCH WAS BUILT IN THE 15TH.CENTURY.
